name: Blank House: Veronica Edition
description:
This is a new edition of the game Blank House, with one additional character, a real person from the 20th Century whose name is Veronica. I made this edition for her birthday. If you have never met Veronica, it may make more sense to download the normal edition of the game. On the other hand, this way you get to meet a cool person who is real, sort of.

This game runs on windows (just unzip the files and run the exe). 

It also contains a glulx file which should be playable on mac if you download Spatterlight for free, but I don't have a mac so I can't test it.
